LanguageData.VCE_StartSoybeanInsertionDesc: Bring soybeans to the fermenter to start fermentation process
LanguageData.VCE_CancelBringingSoybeansDesc: Cancel bringing soybeans to the fermenter.
LanguageData.VCE_RemoveSoySauceDesc: Remove soy sauce from the fermenter. The sauce will be ready at the present quality level ({0})
